settings.title: Shipping & Returns
settings.text: I take great care in packaging your pottery to ensure it arrives safely. Each piece is individually wrapped and cushioned for protection during transit.

settings.title: Shipping Options
settings.text:
Standard Shipping: 3-5 business days via UPS Ground
Express Shipping: 1-2 business days available
Local Pickup: Available in Lake Stevens, WA by appointment

All pottery is marked fragile and insured for full value.

settings.title: Packaging
settings.text:
Each piece is wrapped in bubble wrap and surrounded by eco-friendly packing material. I use sturdy double-wall boxes sized appropriately for your order.

Large orders may be split into multiple packages to ensure safe delivery.

settings.title: Returns & Exchanges
settings.text:
Due to the handmade nature of ceramics, I don't accept returns unless items arrive damaged.

Please inspect your order immediately and contact me within 48 hours if there are any issues. Photos of damage are required for claims.

settings.title: Care Instructions
settings.text:
Your pottery is made to be used and enjoyed daily. All functional pieces are dishwasher, microwave, and oven safe up to 400Â°F.

For best longevity, I recommend hand washing. Avoid sudden temperature changes and store carefully to prevent chips.

With proper care, your pottery will last for generations.
